name: 2 player chess by ubormaci
description:
It's chess. It was mostly made to see if I could even do it.

Also,  it uses Into the Breach sprites, that's because I really like the game and I can't draw to save my life.  Since I make no money from this, I hope the devs won't take issue with this.

Update v1.01: Added an exit button, probably won't work while the win screen is present. Makes it easier to exit the game at least.
